articles.content:
Dennis Waterman, the late Minder and New Tricks star, died in May aged 74. A dad-of-two, his eldest daughter Hannah, 46, is known for her time on EastEnders.
His younger daughter, Julia, 43, also tr… [+3163 chars]

articles.title: Eurovision 2023: Which UK cities have what it takes to host? - Eurovisionworld
articles.description: Eurovision Song Contest 2023 will not be held in Ukraine. EBU is now in talks with United Kingdom's BBC to discuss the possibilities of having this year's runner-up hosting the event. This begs the question: which UK cities have what it takes to host Eurovisi…
articles.content: Not a lot is known about the next year's Eurovision Song Contest. As of now, the only known fact is that Ukraine will not be hosting Eurovision 2023 despite Kalush Orchestra's victory in Turin with t… [+8360 chars]

articles.author: Aidan Wondracz, Nic White
articles.title: Rupert Murdoch splits from Jerry Hall as theory emerges he disapproved of her smoking - Daily Mail
articles.description: The media tycoon was not a fan of his model wife's fondness for tobacco and would often be spotted standing at a distance as Ms Hall took a drag on a cigarette.
articles.content:
A theory has emerged that Rupert Murdoch ended his six-year marriage to model Jerry Hall because he disapproved of his fourth wife's smoking habit.
